# interpret.slopes { #bambi.interpret.slopes }

```python
interpret.slopes(
    model,
    idata,
    wrt,
    conditional=None,
    average_by=None,
    eps=0.0001,
    slope='dydx',
    target='mean',
    pps=False,
    use_hdi=True,
    prob=az.rcParams['stats.ci_prob'],
    transforms=None,
    sample_new_groups=False,
)
```

Compute conditional adjusted slopes.

Slopes are computed using finite differences. The wrt variable is evaluated at
[x, x + eps] and the slope is approximated as (f(x + eps) - f(x)) / eps.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**model**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[Model](`bambi.models.Model`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The fitted Bambi model.

<code>[**idata**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[InferenceData](`arviz.InferenceData`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   InferenceData object containing the posterior samples.

<code>[**wrt**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`) or [dict](`dict`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The predictor variable to compute the slope with respect to. Either a variable name (uses mean/mode as evaluation point) or a single-entry dict mapping variable name to a specific evaluation point.

<code>[**conditional**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[ConditionalParam](`ConditionalParam`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [None]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Variables to condition on for slopes.

<code>[**average_by**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [([str](`str`), [list](`list`) or None)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [None]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Variables to average slopes over.

<code>[**eps**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[float](`float`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [0.0001]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Perturbation size for finite differencing. Default is 1e-4.

<code>[**slope**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`) or [SlopeFunc](`bambi.interpret.ops.SlopeFunc`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [\'dydx\']{.parameter-default}</code>

:   The type of slope to compute. Default is 'dydx'. Built-in options: 'dydx' - unit change in wrt associated with a unit change in response. 'eyex' - percent change in wrt associated with a percent change in response. 'eydx' - unit change in wrt associated with a percent change in response. 'dyex' - percent change in wrt associated with a unit change in response.

<code>[**target**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [\'mean\']{.parameter-default}</code>

:   The target parameter to compute slopes for. Default is "mean".

<code>[**pps**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[bool](`bool`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [False]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Whether to use posterior predictive samples. Default is False.

<code>[**use_hdi**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[bool](`bool`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [True]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Whether to use highest density interval. Default is True.

<code>[**prob**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[float](`float`) or [list](`list`)\[[float](`float`)\]]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [az.rcParams\[\'stats.ci_prob\'\]]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Probability or list of probabilities for credible intervals. Default is from arviz rcParams. When a list is provided, multiple nested intervals are computed.

<code>[**transforms**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[dict](`dict`) or None]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [None]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Dictionary of transformations to apply to predictions before differencing.

<code>[**sample_new_groups**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[bool](`bool`)]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [False]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Whether to sample new group levels. Default is False.

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

<code>[]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[DataFrame](`pandas.DataFrame`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   A DataFrame containing the conditional adjusted slopes with summary statistics.

## Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

<code>[[ValueError](`ValueError`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   If any prob value is not between 0 and 1.

<code>[[TypeError](`TypeError`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   If slope is not a callable or valid string.
